name: Maryfrances CASSELL, Respondent, v. LANCASTER MENNONITE CONFERENCE, Petitioner

parties: Maryfrances CASSELL, Respondent, v. LANCASTER MENNONITE CONFERENCE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of June, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether the Superior Court departed from the established Frye standard by concluding the psychologist’s methodology was generally accepted in the field.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
853 A.2d 1009
Maryfrances CASSELL, Respondent, v. LANCASTER MENNONITE CONFERENCE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 14, 2004.
